game.name: Monster Truck Driving Simulator Game
game.description:
All the popular monster truck racers have already gathered here to challenge with each other! Where are you guys? Join Monster Truck Driving Simulator and be prepared to drive a wonderful monster truck through three different worlds! You are sure to get a whole new awesome driving experience being involved in this brand new racing game. Do not bother about the controls as they are easy to understand for everyone. Take your seat on your chosen truck and gear up to do something big for today!

Complete your mission while also focusing on collecting the money in this HTML5 truck game! Choose any map out of the three options including desert, snow and forest and get ready to play the role of a professional stunt truck driver! Your driving skills would be tested to accomplish your mission fast. Make sure to grab as much money as you can and collect a good amount of nitro boost bottles that are scattered in different places around the massive world.

This new off road monster truck driving Simulator 3D features a large variety of realistic 4x4 luxury vehicles, cool graphics and seamless gameplay. You are given an awesome opportunity to drive monster truck across different countries around the globe. There are multiple vehicles like Traxxas RC trucks, Virginia Beast tanks, Outback Thunda, and BIGFOOT to choose from. Different attractive backgrounds and landscape maps will keep you busy for hours. Drive latest truck through deserts of snow covered tracks in your own style!
